member.name: M:Honoplay.TrainerWebAPI.Controllers.ClassroomController.GetByTrainingId(System.Int32)
member.summary: This service retrieve classroom list by trainingId, trainerId
member.returns: Get classrooms by tenantId, trainingId, trainerId with status code.

member.name: M:Honoplay.TrainerWebAPI.Controllers.TraineeUserController.GetByClassRoomId(System.Int32)
member.summary: This service retrieve trainings by trainingId
member.returns: Get trainings by tenant id and trainerUser id with status code.
